channel.title: My server wont run. HELP!
channel.description:
When i click runserver.bat it says
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Whats wrong with it my runserver.bat is:
[code]@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
HELP please?

item.title: My server wont run. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

i suggest you go into the tutorials sectiona nd look for a thread called “taharok compiler” or there abouts… and if that dont work then you need to install the latest JDk - java development kit, found at www.java.sun.com

Read full topic

item.title: My server wont run. HELP!
